name: 1. GPT-5.1 Pro
details: Instant personalization updates (applies to ongoing chats)
Higher message limits than lower tiers
No rate limiting during peak hours

name: 2. Claude Pro
details: Session limit resets every 5 hours (rolling window)
Projects (organize work with custom knowledge bases)
Artifacts (interactive outputs: code execution, file creation, spreadsheets, slides, docs)

name: 3. Perplexity Pro
details: 3x more sources per search than free tier

Extended Perplexity Research access (deep research mode)
API access (separate billing from Pro subscription)

Library search (enhanced, faster, searches full conversation history)
Improved context handling across long threads
All features available regardless of spend tier (as of April 2025)

name: 9. Canva Business
details: No Minimum Seats (available for solo users)
Magic Design (generate personalized designs from prompts)

Magic Write (AI text generation for marketing copy, captions, scripts)

GPT-5.1 Pro - Most advanced OpenAI reasoning, unlimited access, Pro-exclusive thinking modes
Claude Pro - 200K context, state-of-the-art coding, Projects, Artifacts
Perplexity Pro - 600+ Pro searches/day, GPT-5.1, Claude 4.5, Gemini 2.5 Pro, real-time research

Magai Pro - 50+ models with context-switching, Prompt Enhancer, workspaces, document editor
GenSpark Plus - Unlimited multi-model access, Super Agent, creative suite, 80+ integrations
Microsoft 365 Copilot Pro - GPT-5, agents, voice, full Office suite, 1TB OneDrive (6TB for family)
Google One Pro 5TB - 5TB storage, Gemini 2.5 Pro (until June 2025), VPN, premium Photos tools
Google Cloud Standard - Always-free tier, $300 trial, 150+ services, Firebase, Workspace APIs
Canva Business - Unlimited designs, 1TB storage, AI suite, Visual Suite 2.0, social scheduler, team collaboration
Affinity (FREE) - Professional design suite (Photo, Designer, Publisher in one), perpetually free
